11tea (Eleventea) is a ready-to-go starter to make website using Eleventy, Tailwind CSS, and Alpine.js which, all together are forming the new fancy TEA-Stack. Have some tea!

How to use

# clone this repository
git clone git@github.com:halfmage/11tea.git

# navigate to you folder
cd 11tea

# install dependencies
npm install

# build the project to generate css (_tmp folder)
npm run build

# start the watcher
npm run start

Details

  • Tailwind: The config file in rhe root folder includes future settings with removeDeprecatedGapUtilities and purgeLayersByDefault set to true. Therefore it is already prepared for v2

  • Favicons: For the generation of social images and favicon files I used Real Favicon Generator and adopted the file names of the exports so you can easily copy and replace those images
